/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a highway in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a curved overpass, providing a panoramic view of the scene below. The highway, divided by a concrete barrier, stretches out ahead, flanked by lush green trees on both sides. A white car can be seen in the distance, moving along the road, adding a sense of motion to the otherwise still landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is a blend of urban and natural elements, showcasing the harmonious coexistence of man-made structures and nature in Beijing.
